title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not have any effect on the displayed results.
OB: The dynamic text element's Content Type property is expected to control the way the content is displayed.
EB:
Regardless of the value set in the dynamic text element's Content Type property (Auto, Plain, or HTML), the report always displays the same results. The expected results are as follows:

1. For Plain, the literal content (tags and all) should be displayed.
2. For Auto, content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
3. For HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear literally with RTF tags.
SR: Please investigate and fix the issue causing the dynamic text element's Content Type property to have no effect on the displayed results. The expected behavior should align with the descriptions provided for each Content Type option.
